response.job_title: MSc. Modeling and Simulation candidate | Mechanical Engineer | Secondary School Teacher
response.summary: Mechanical Engineer | Product Design | Programming and Simulation | Associate Teacher
response.skills: Python, AutoCAD, SolidWorks, Matlab, Programming, Simulation Modeling, Simulation Programming, Mechanical Product Design, Mechanical Analysis, Machine Design, Materials, CAD, Stress Analysis, ANSYS, Numerical Analysis, Finite Element Analysis, Inventor, Microsoft Office, Engineering, Inglés

company.name: Ministry of Education of the Capital District

profile_positions.description:
Functions
To coordinate all the activities of the engineering area, stablishing deadlines for each one of them and measuring them through management indicators. To do the required design engineering to each one of the projects assigned from benchmarking to detailed drawings for its production, giving support to the production technicians when required. To make the cost structure for the new projects with no preview background in the company, looking for the best price for the company as well as for the customer. To give support to the sales area with technical advices to achieve the needs and requirements of the customers in the best way possible. To make sketches as previews for the customers of the main ideas of the development of their products. To participate in the managerial meetings with the other areas of the company in other to propose solutions to immediate or long-term projects. 

Achievements
Implementation of a Visual Basic module for automating the process of parts and drafting in Solidworks software. It reduced execution times and optimized the use of materials in the cut process; waists went down from 10 to 6.5%.
profile_positions.title: Coordinator of the Engineering Area

profile_positions.description:
Functions
Theorical-practical development of the contents for the assigned subjects, following the thematic guidance given by the faculty. Responsible of planning, executing and evaluating the courses of climatization, technical drawing and sustainable development through course lectures in the engineering department; besides leading the laboratory practices. To elaborate management reports and grades supports. The classes were developed using actual pedagogical methodologies in which the constructivism and the collaborative work were the main teaching tools.
profile_positions.title: Associated Teacher

profile_positions.description:
Functions

Responsible of planning, executing and evaluating the activities assigned for the main teacher of the course Introduction to Heat Transfer; direction of laboratory practices and the workshop classes where through examples and collaborative exercises students could reinforce their knowledge acquired in the main lecture. When required, give the main lecture for more than 60 students at once. To assist to the main teacher in administrative activities.
profile_positions.title: Teacher Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Functions
In charge of creating designs and its detailed drafting, considering the client needs and the company technical specifications using 3D or 2D modeling software such as Solidworks and AutoCAD. To update previous models, assembles, drafting plans and materials lists based on given feedbacks through verification, design validation and/or market feedback on the stablished prototypes. Integration, management and actualization of the information system according to the company needs.
profile_positions.title: Junior Design Engineer

company.name: Corporación Centro de Investigación en Palma de Aceite, Cenipalma

profile_positions.company: Corporación Centro de Investigación en Palma de Aceite, Cenipalma
profile_positions.description:
Functions:
In charge of the implementation of the first stage of the maintenance project through grabbing and managing the maintain information of the palm oil extraction plants assigned to the project. To train the person in charge of collecting the maintenance information on how to do that labor, and in how to get the information into the system given to each plant.
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant

company.name: Secretaria de Educación Distrital
